p: Leaves of Callistemon citrinus, C. rigidus and C. viminalis (Myrtaceae) were collected in four different seasons from a private botanical garden in Giza, Egypt. Plants were kindly identified by Mrs. Trease Labib, Plant Taxonomy Consultant at the Ministry of Agriculture and former director of Orman Botanical Garden, Giza, Egypt. Voucher specimens were deposited in the herbarium of Pharmacognosy Department, Faculty of Pharmacy, Ain Shams University (PHG-P-CC; PHG-P-CR; and PHG-P-CV).
